nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Jar Jar's Big Day

Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Jar Jar's Big Day is a 32-page and young reader book that adapts The Clone Wars television series episode "Bombad Jedi." It was adapted by Rob Valois for Grosset & Dunlap in 2009.

Has Jar Jar Binks become a Jedi? That's what everyone thinks as he sets out on a dangerous mission to rescue his friends Padmé Amidala and C-3PO from the clutches of the evil Separatist Alliance. Will the Force be with Jar Jar?
